name: 100 BOBOS
description:
Try to clear all 100 levels of this fun Arcade Game. Collect the elemental BOBOS before the tank is full of them and overflows. 

- The yellow(air) BOBOS collect the green(earth) BOBOS.

- The green(earth) BOBOS collect the blue(water) BOBOS.

- The blue(water) BOBOS collect the red(fire) BOBOS.

- The red(fire) BOBOS collect the yellow(air) BOBOS.

There are also special BOBOS that can destroy others, give more stamina or slow down the stream. And more will be introduced as the levels become more difficult over time.

NOTE:  When you do not allow storage cookies to be saved to your device from this website your progress will not be saved and can not play the other levels!
